briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of Vortioxetine (Lu AA21004) in Adults With Major Depressive Disorder
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Placebo-Controlled, Fixed-Dose Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of 2 Doses (10 and 20 mg) of Lu AA21004 in Acute Treatment of Adults With Major Depressive Disorder
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of vortioxetine, once daily (QD), compared with placebo in adults with major depressive disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Montgomery-Åsberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) Total Score
